trans-unit.source: Defines constants that specify whether cells, rows, or both, are used for selection in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Definierar konstanter som anger om celler, rader eller båda kan användas för val i en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"> </xref> kontroll.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionMode%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionUnit%2A> properties together determine how users can select items in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionMode%2A>och <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionUnit%2A>Egenskaper tillsammans bestämmer hur användarna kan välja objekt i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionUnit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionMode%2A> is <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridSelectionMode> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionUnit%2A> is Cell, the user can select only one cell at a time in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>.
trans-unit.target: Till exempel om den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionMode%2A>är <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridSelectionMode>och <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionUnit%2A>är Cell och användaren kan bara markera en cell i taget i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionUnit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridSelectionMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Clicking a cell selects the cell.
trans-unit.target: Om du klickar på en cell markeras cellen.

trans-unit.source: Clicking a row or column header does nothing.
trans-unit.target: Om du klickar på en rad eller kolumn ingenting.

trans-unit.source: Clicking a cell selects only the cell.
trans-unit.target: Om du klickar på en cell markeras endast i cellen.

trans-unit.source: Clicking a row header selects the full row.
trans-unit.target: Fullständig rad markeras klickar på en radrubrik.

trans-unit.source: Clicking a cell or a row header selects the full row.
trans-unit.target: Fullständig rad markeras klickar på en cell eller en radrubrik.
